title: Brian & Jenn Johnson on Hearing The Voice of The Lord
description:
Sadie visits with Brian and Jenn Johnson, the founders of Bethel Music. Jenn shares dating advice from her mom and talks about the value of focusing on developing friendships in relationships and listening to the Holy Spirit. Brian talks about getting a word from God and sticking to it until you get another one. www.bethelmusic.com
